description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A vast mass of obstacles are between you and the finish line. Can you dodge the impossible and make your way to outer space? Supports Multiplayer, XBox Live & System Link Co-Op action.
